text: Good basic food.. When the owner is not trying to hit on your girlfriend. I go to the bathroom and this guy is in my seat.. She was pretty creeped out.
Great food, great prices and very friendly staff. Bozena is the nicest person and always remembers us. She is an asset to this breakfast place for sure!
Got take out here, fried egg with cheese was good, tasty and big. Seating looked decent, they don't take credit card which was annoying as no one had a bank card. Staff was friendly and there.
